Class Controlador

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Controlador
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener
    Class which represents a Controller using the code pattern of model-view-controller

    JDK8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
